--- title: villaAuthSdk keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "interact with villa authentication backend" description: "interact with villa authentication backend" nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install villaAuthSdk

How to use

create an auth object

{% raw %} 
from villaAuthSdk.auth import AuthSdk
from nicHelper.dictUtil import printDict
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sdk=AuthSdk(user=None,pw=None,region='ap-southeast-1')
## user and pw here are the aws key/secret for your client
{% endraw %}

Create cashier

{% raw %} 
sdk.createCashier({
  'user': 'nic1',
  'phone': '+66816684442',
  'pw': '12345678',
  'name': 'nic',
  'cashierId': '001'
})

{'success': True,
 'user': 'nic1',
 'phone': '+66816684442',
 'pw': '12345678',
 'name': 'nic',
 'cashierId': '001'}
{% endraw %}

login

{% raw %} 
result = sdk.auth(user='nic1',pw='12345678')
printDict(result)
{% endraw %}

Confirm

confirm phone/email

{% raw %} 
result=sdk.confirm(user='nic1', code= '123')
printDict(result)
{% endraw %}

Get Profile

{% raw %} 
result=sdk.getProfile('nic1')
printDict(result)
{% endraw %}

update Profile

{% raw %} 
result = sdk.updateProfile(
  user= 'nic1',
  attributes= {
    'custom:cashierCode': '1234'
  })
printDict(result)
{% endraw %}

set password

{% raw %} 
sdk.setPassword(user='nic1',pw='12345678')
{% endraw %}

Unauth

get unauthenticated credentials

{% raw %} 
result = sdk.unauth()
printDict(result)
{% endraw %}
